snippet: Drew K. Brownstein, the former hedge fund manager, was sentenced to a year and a day in prison after pleading guilty to charges of insider trading involving Mariner Energy.
abstract: Drew K. Brownstein, the former hedge fund manager, was sentenced to a year and a day in prison after pleading guilty to charges of insider trading involving Mariner Energy.

headline.main: Ex-Fund Manager Gets Prison Term in Insider Trading Case
headline.print_headline: Fund Manager Gets 366 Days in Insider Trading Case
